Statement: The scenario and context of the training were interesting.
I wanted to successfully finish the training and complete all the tasks.
To me, the scenario and context seemed to be realistic.
I my opinion, the tasks I performed represent skills that are required in real incident repsonse work.
During the training, I felt I was in control over my actions.
During the training, I had a sense that I made good progress.
During the training, I experienced excitement.
I was satisfied with my performance during the training.
In my opinion, I have reached the learning objectives of the cyber range training.
In my opinion, I have gained security skills and knowledge that might be helpful in the future.
I was overwhelmed by the complexity of the tasks
During large parts of the the training, I felt stressed or frustrated.
